org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.song

Class SongsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.commons.adt.ObservableListManager<Song>
      • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.song.SongsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListListener<Song>, ObservableListListener<Song>

    public class SongsManager
extends ObservableListManager<Song>
    Manager responsible for keep in memory the songs imported in the library.

    Since this manager is a ObservableFileListManager, it handles the changes to the songs by save them to the disk and load the saved files when needed.

        public void onElementsAdded(java.util.List<? extends Song> songs)
        Description copied from interface: ListListener
        Called when elements are added to the list.

        If multiple items are added at the same time (e.g. with List.addAll(int, Collection) this method is called just once for all the elements.

      • onElementsChanged

        public void onElementsChanged(java.util.List<? extends Song> songs)
        Description copied from interface: ObservableListListener
        Called when elements are updated in the list.

        The changes to the list's elements are detected via the Observable interface which is implemented by the elements.

        If multiple items are updated at the same time (e.g. with List.replaceAll(UnaryOperator) this method is called just once for all the elements.

        Specified by:
        onElementsChanged in interface ObservableListListener<Song>
        Overrides:
        onElementsChanged in class ObservableListManager<Song>
        Parameters:
        songs - the changed elements
